comment: по клику на свечи по оружейной турели

languages.text: Нагар от свечей толстым слоем лег на механизмы, парализовав грозное орудие.
A thick layer of candle snuff covers the mechanisms, paralysing the formidable weapon.
languages.original_text: Нагар от свечей толстым слоем лег на механизмы, парализовав грозное орудие.

traits.locale_text: A thick layer of candle snuff covers the mechanisms, paralysing the formidable weapon.
A thick layer of candle snuff covers the mechanisms, paralysing the formidable weapon.
A thick layer of candle snuff covers the mechanisms, paralysing the formidable weapon.

A thick layer of candle snuff covers the mechanisms, paralysing the formidable weapon.
A thick layer of candle snuff covers the mechanisms, paralysing the formidable weapon.

languages.text: キャンドルの芯の厚い層が機械を覆い、恐ろしい兵器の動きを止めている。
languages.original_text: A thick layer of candle snuff covers the mechanisms, paralysing the formidable weapon.

traits.locale_text: キャンドルの芯の厚い層が機械を覆い、恐ろしい兵器の動きを止めている。

languages.text: 一层厚厚的蜡状物体覆盖在机器表面，让这可怕的武器瘫痪了下来。
languages.original_text: A thick layer of candle snuff covers the mechanisms, paralysing the formidable weapon.

traits.locale_text: 一层厚厚的蜡状物体覆盖在机器表面，让这可怕的武器瘫痪了下来。

languages.text: Le mécanisme de l'arme est paralysé par une épaisse couche de cire durcie.
languages.original_text: A thick layer of candle snuff covers the mechanisms, paralysing the formidable weapon.

traits.locale_text: Le mécanisme de l'arme est paralysé par une épaisse couche de cire durcie.

languages.text: Los mecanismos están cubiertos por una gruesa capa de cera de vela, paralizando esta formidable arma.
languages.original_text: A thick layer of candle snuff covers the mechanisms, paralysing the formidable weapon.

traits.locale_text: Los mecanismos están cubiertos por una gruesa capa de cera de vela, paralizando esta formidable arma.

languages.text: Eine dicke Schicht Kerzenruß bedeckt die Mechanismen und lähmt die formidable Waffe.
languages.original_text: A thick layer of candle snuff covers the mechanisms, paralysing the formidable weapon.

traits.locale_text: Eine dicke Schicht Kerzenruß bedeckt die Mechanismen und lähmt die formidable Waffe.

languages.text: Mekanizmayı kalın bir mum kalıntısı tabakası kaplamış, kudretli silahı kullanılamaz hâle getirmiş.
languages.original_text: A thick layer of candle snuff covers the mechanisms, paralysing the formidable weapon.

traits.locale_text: Mekanizmayı kalın bir mum kalıntısı tabakası kaplıyor ve kudretli silahı kullanılamaz hâle getiriyor.
